original_text: And Moses stretched forth his hand toward heaven; and there was a thick darkness in all the land of Egypt three days:
korean_text: 모세가 하늘을 향하여 손을 내밀매 캄캄한 흑암이 삼 일 동안 애굽 온 땅에 있어서

sentences.original_text: And Moses stretched forth his hand toward heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세는 하늘을 향해 손을 뻗었다

sentences.original_text: and there was a thick darkness
in all the land of Egypt
